erworld from Ancient Egypt

>> I would turn the the olivus on and then ask your spir=
it guide to tell

s like he is

y always

you

e
>> on this board or the other yahoo board recently posted a file that
>> =
address the protection issue. As ALWAYS ask the spirits to go back to
>> th=
ere side before you close a session. I always try to confirm with my
>> spi=
rit guide/tech before shutting down. I address my guide directly to
>> send=
 all the spirits back(she knows how to do it real good). Being
>> skeptical=
 will not help you if you have a undesirable spirit hanging
>> around. Ask =
your guide to specifically never let seth in again.
